What is hernia and how to heal it naturally?

I think you will agree with me when I say:

It is tiring to hear everyone everywhere say that hernia can only be cured with surgery and there is no other option!

No need to worry.

As it turns out, you can easily cure your hernia without having to talk to anyone about it. Grocare is offering a treatment with more than 89% success rate.

In this article, we will help you understand hernia treatment without surgery. However, before that, it is important that you understand what a hernia really is. Then we will talk about a natural cure for hernia.

What is hernia?

The text book definition of a hernia is “A bulging of an organ or tissue through an abnormal opening”, occurring mostly in the intestinal region. However, this is not the definition of a hernia according to Ayurveda.

Ayurveda describes a hernia as a swelling of the intestine, due to the presence of a sub clinical infection inside it.

Now

This swelling overtime causes the abdominal wall to weaken and eventually the intestine swells up so much that the weak abdominal wall cannot hold the pressure and gives in. This means that the weakest link on the abdominal wall is the point where someone would get a hernia. That is why in Ayurveda, all hernias are classified to be similar in nature – as they are all swelling of the intestine.

The funny thing is.

We have learnt since childhood that the abdominal wall is one of the most flexible walls in the body. So can it really get ruptured?

So what exactly happens?

Imagine a balloon with a long pipe in it. If the pipe swells up, eventually the balloon will deform from the weakest spot on the balloon first. Right? Now the balloon is the abdominal wall and the pipe is the intestine which has swelled up. This means that there is scope of healing the hernia. Yes. But how.

Hernia is a lifestyle disease. This means that if you do not maintain a healthy lifestyle you are prone to developing a hernia. Statistics say 1 in 4 people will develop a hernia in their life.

Did you know over 35% hernia cases relapse within a few years of surgery?

See.

Imagine that you cut open the balloon and push the pipe in and put a layer over the cut balloon to make sure it doesn’t pop again.

Is that the solution?

The fact is, the internal swelling of the hernia will still be there. How will it help cure the problem. This is why in many cases you will find that the hernia relapses overtime. Maybe in the same form, or maybe in another form. You will often find people who developed a umbilical hernia after a inguinal hernia surgery. Simply because the reason being the internal swelling is still there. Unless you fix the problem from within, the hernia will keep coming back eventually. You can read the full article on this here – Is surgery really the answer to a hernia?

You can also read about cases who got operated for hernia and how they are suffering from new problems here – Why is there pain even after hernia surgery ?

To Get Rid Of the Swelling, You should do this

Intestinal swelling occurs due to a sub clinical infection in the intestine. A sub clinical means an infection which modern tests cannot detect because it is not in large disturbing numbers.

But it is still an infection which makes the system weak.

This infection develops due to our lifestyle, eating habits, sleeping habits which makes the intestine weak and makes the intestine the perfect place for an infection to sit in. Eventually to fight the infection, the intestine swells up.

Just like we get a fever to kill the flu!

Hernia Treatment Without Surgery

Grocare India brings to you two medicines, Hernica and Acidim which have stood the test of time for hernia treatment without surgery. What these medicines do is remove the infection from within and give strength to the intestinal system within. Once the system becomes healthy and without the infection, the swelling of the intestine reduces, and the hernia comes back into place. However, the abdominal wall is still weak and takes longer to gain strength. That is why the treatment is 6 month long. But this way, once healed, you cannot get hernia again because you have taken care of the problem internally.

The best part of this:

Is that this is a permanent cure for hernia treatment without surgery.

But don’t forget that hernia is a lifestyle disease. This means that if you follow a bad lifestyle, one that your body cannot adapt to, your internal systems will develop more problems. This not only means hernia but other diseases such as varicose veins, tinnitus, IBS, Colitis, Piles and the list goes on and on. Until you address the real problem from within any medication can only help so much. So what is the real problem – your lifestyle.

But does it actually work? 

No matter how much we tell you it works, you will always have your doubts.

And that is understandable.
